Ucchepaka，（nt．） [= ucchiṭṭhaka in sense of ucchiṭṭhabhatta] leavings of food M．II，7 （v．l．uccepaka with cc for cch as ucciṭṭha：ucchiṭṭha）．The passage is to be read ucchepake va te ratā．A diff．connotation would be implied by taking ucchepaka = uñchā，as Neumann does （Majjhima trsl．<sup>2</sup> II．682）．（Page 128）

ucchepaka：ဥစ္ဆေပက （န）
စားကြွင်း။
